state: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu

hospital_private: Number of private hospitals in each State/UT can be estimated based on specific percentage break-up of hospitals (as provided in NSS) and number of government hospitals (as provided in NHP) in that State/UT
hospital_total: Number of private hospitals at India level is equal to sum total of private hospitals across all States/UTs
hospital_beds_private: Number of private hospital beds in each State/UT can also be estimated by using the same percentage break-up as used to calculate the number of private hospitals, since the number of government hospital beds were available for each State/UT
hospital_beds_total: Number of private hospital beds at India level is equal to sum total of private hospital beds across all States/Uts
icu_beds_public: ICU bed strength is at 5% of hospital bed strength
icu_beds_private: ICU bed strength is at 5% of hospital bed strength
icu_beds_total: ICU bed strength is at 5% of hospital bed strength
ventilators_public: 50% of ICU beds across both public and private sector, are equipped with ventilators.
ventilators_private: 50% of ICU beds across both public and private sector, are equipped with ventilators.
ventilators_total: 50% of ICU beds across both public and private sector, are equipped with ventilators.
